question.direction-text: Select the appropriate sentences from the answer choices that are key points in a discussion of how well various publishers succeeded in creating adless newspapers. This question is worth 3 points.

intro-text.b: This passage discusses radical shifts in population that the bald eagle has undergone

answer.answer-text: The numbers of bald eagles were greatly reduced, at least in part due to the effects of a pesticide.
The legislation has had a positive effect on the number of bald eagles.
The bald eagle was named as the national symbol of the United States in the late eighteenth century.
Early in the history of the United States, there were huge numbers of bald eagles.
Two different pieces of legislation that affected the bald eagle were enacted 33 years apart.
The federal government enacted legislation specifically designed to protect the bald eagle as well as to outlaw the pesticide DDT.
